I'll show you an example - tap the Natur: Ke tla go bontšha mohlala - tobetša morero wa Tlhago
You can choose a start date and end date: O ka kgetha letšatšikgwedi la go thoma le letšatšikgwedi la go fetša morero wo.
You can choose a language for this theme: O ka kgetha leleme la morero wo. Ke tla go bontšha mešongwana ya leleme le ge e le gona.
Great! I have planned all your activitie: Agaa! Ke beakantše mešongwana ya gago ka moka! Tobetša mošongwana go bona dintlha.
See the activity details here. You're al: Bona dintlha tša mošongwana fa. O feditše go tsenya morero!
If you don't want to use a theme, you ca: Ge o sa nyake go tsenya morero, o ka tobetša fa go kgetha mošongwana!
Great! Now the activity is selected. Whe: Agaa! Bjale mošongwana o kgethilwe. Ge o nyaka go ithuta tše ntši ka ga mošongwana, o ka tobetša aekhone ye.
